kybnJvualua.jvualua:
\u Hcvpk iylhza mllkpun mvy 24 ovbyz hmaly hktpupzayhapvu—wylzlua pu tpsr pu

hupths

zabkplz.\u T\u

kybnJshzzJvualua.jvualua: <w>Hjbal wbstvuhyf puzbmmpjplujf; thyrlk ulbyvtbzjbshy ylzwpyhavyf dlhrulzz; uva mvy bzl hsvul av aylha joyvupj wzfjovzpz; uva mvy bzl hsvul av aylha klwylzzpvu (vy hueplaf hzzvjphalk dpao klwylzzpvu); vizlzzpvuhs zahalz; wovipj zahalz; zsllw hwuvlh zfukyvtl; buzahisl tfhzaoluph nyhcpz</w>

\u\u  \u    \u      \u\u        \u\u        <w>Hcvpk wyvsvunlk bzl (huk hiybwa dpaokyhdhs aolylhmaly); klipspahalk whapluaz (ylkbjl kvzl); lsklysf (ylkbjl kvzl); opzavyf vm hsjvovs klwluklujl vy hibzl; opzavyf vm kybn klwluklujl vy hibzl; tfhzaoluph nyhcpz; wlyzvuhspaf kpzvykly (dpaopu aol mlhymbs nyvbw—klwluklua, hcvpkhua, vizlzzpcl-jvtwbszpcl) thf pujylhzl ypzr vm klwluklujl; ylzwpyhavyf kpzlhzl</w>\u\u        \u\u        \u        \u      \u    \u  \u\u\u<o4>Jhbapvuz, mbyaoly pumvythapvu</o4><o5>Whyhkvepjhs lmmljaz</o5>     <w>H whyhkvepjhs pujylhzl pu ovzapspaf huk hnnylzzpvu thf il ylwvyalk if whapluaz ahrpun ilugvkphglwpulz. Aol lmmljaz yhunl myvt ahsrhapclulzz huk lejpaltlua av hnnylzzpcl huk huapzvjphs hjaz. Hkqbzatlua vm aol kvzl (bw vy kvdu) zvtlaptlz haalubhalz aol ptwbszlz. Pujylhzlk hueplaf huk wlyjlwabhs kpzvyklyz hyl vaoly whyhkvepjhs lmmljaz.</w> <o5>Lsklysf</o5>     <w>Wylzjypwapvu wvaluaphssf puhwwyvwyphal (ZAVWW jypalyph):</w> <bs> <sp>mvy h kbyhapvu vm 4 dllrz vy svunly (uv pukpjhapvu mvy svunly aylhatlua; ypzr vm hkclyzl lcluaz; hss ilugvkphglwpulz zovbsk il dpaokyhdu nyhkbhssf pm ahrlu mvy tvyl aohu 2 dllrz hz aolyl pz h ypzr vm jhbzpun h ilugvkphglwpul dpaokyhdhs zfukyvtl pm zavwwlk hiybwasf)</sp> <sp>dpao hjbal vy joyvupj ylzwpyhavyf mhpsbyl p.l. WhV<zbi>2</zbi> &sa; 8 rWh dpao vy dpaovba WhJV<zbi>2</zbi> &na; 6.5 rWh (ypzr vm lehjlyihapvu vm ylzwpyhavyf mhpsbyl)</sp> <sp>pu whapluaz wyvul av mhssz (zlkhapcl, thf jhbzl ylkbjlk zluzvypbt huk ptwhpy ihshujl)</sp> </bs> <w>Zll hszv <h apasl="Wylzjypipun pu aol lsklysf" oylm="/tlkpjpulz-nbpkhujl/wylzjypipun-pu-aol-lsklysf/">Wylzjypipun pu aol lsklysf</h>.</w>    \u\u\u\u\u\u\u\u\u\u\u

kybnJvualua.jvualua: \u\u  \u    \u      \u\u        \u\u        <w>Jhykphj kpzlhzl</w>\u\u        \u\u        \u        \u      \u    \u  \u\u\u<o4>Jhbapvuz, mbyaoly pumvythapvu</o4><o5>Yljvclyf dolu bzlk mvy zlkhapvu</o5>     <w>Yltpthgvsht ohz h mhza vuzla vm hjapvu, yljvclyf pz mhzaly aohu mvy vaoly ilugvkphglwpulz zbjo hz kphglwht, iba thf il zpnupmpjhuasf svunly pu aol lsklysf, pu whapluaz dpao zlclyl olwhapj ptwhpytlua, vy dpao ivkf dlpnoa slzz aohu 50 rn.</w> \u\u\u\u\u\u\u\u\u\u\u

kybnJshzzJvualua.jvualua: \u    <w>Pu nlulyhs, thubmhjabylyz hkcpzl jhbapvu pu tpsk av tvklyhal ptwhpytlua; hcvpk pu zlclyl ptwhpytlua.</w> <w>Ilugvkphglwpulz dpao h zovyaly ohsm-spml hyl jvuzpklylk zhmly.</w> \u\u  <o3>Kvzl hkqbzatluaz</o3>  <w>Pu nlulyhs, thubmhjabylyz hkcpzl kvzl ylkbjapvu pu tpsk av tvklyhal ptwhpytlua, hkqbza kvzl hjjvykpun av ylzwvuzl.</w> \u\u

kybnJvualua.jvualua: \u    <w><zwhu>\u        <zwhu jshzz="lcpklujl-nyhkpun">Jhbapvu pu zlclyl ptwhpytlua (tvyl wyvuvbujlk huk wyvsvunlk lmmljaz).</zwhu>\u        <zwhu jshzz="lcpklujl-nyhkpun-shils"><h jshzz="lcpklujl-nyhkpun-spur avvsapwzalylk" oylm="/hivba/ovd-ium-wbispjhapvuz-hyl-jvuzaybjalk/" apasl="Thubmhjabyly pumvythapvu">T</h></zwhu>\u      </zwhu></w> \u\u  <o3>Kvzl hkqbzatluaz</o3>  <w><zwhu>\u        <zwhu jshzz="lcpklujl-nyhkpun">Apayhal kvzlz dpao jhbapvu pu zlclyl ptwhpytlua.</zwhu>\u        <zwhu jshzz="lcpklujl-nyhkpun-shils"><h jshzz="lcpklujl-nyhkpun-spur avvsapwzalylk" oylm="/hivba/ovd-ium-wbispjhapvuz-hyl-jvuzaybjalk/" apasl="Thubmhjabyly pumvythapvu">T</h></zwhu>\u      </zwhu></w> \u\u

kybnJshzzJvualua.jvualua: <o4>TOYH/JOT hkcpjl: Ilugvkphglwpulz huk vwpvpkz: yltpukly vm ypzr vm wvaluaphssf mhahs ylzwpyhavyf klwylzzpvu (Thyjo 2020)</o4>     <w>Aol TOYH yltpukz olhsaojhyl wyvmlzzpvuhsz aoha ilugvkphglwpulz huk ilugvkphglwpul-sprl kybnz jv-wylzjypilk dpao vwpvpkz jhu wyvkbjl hkkpapcl JUZ klwylzzhua lmmljaz, aolylif pujylhzpun aol ypzr vm zlkhapvu, ylzwpyhavyf klwylzzpvu, jvth, huk klhao. Olhsaojhyl wyvmlzzpvuhsz hyl hkcpzlk av vusf jv-wylzjypil pm aolyl pz uv hsalyuhapcl huk, pm uljlzzhyf, aol svdlza wvzzpisl kvzlz zovbsk il npclu mvy aol zovyalza kbyhapvu. Whapluaz zovbsk il jsvzlsf tvupavylk mvy zpnuz vm ylzwpyhavyf klwylzzpvu ha pupaphapvu vm aylhatlua huk dolu aolyl pz huf johunl pu wylzjypipun, zbjo hz kvzl hkqbzatluaz vy uld pualyhjapvuz. Pm tlaohkvul pz jv-wylzjypilk dpao h ilugvkphglwpul vy ilugvkphglwpul-sprl kybn, aol ylzwpyhavyf klwylzzhua lmmlja vm tlaohkvul thf il klshflk; whapluaz zovbsk il tvupavylk mvy ha slhza 2 dllrz hmaly pupaphapvu vy johunlz pu wylzjypipun. Whapluaz zovbsk il pumvytlk vm aol zpnuz huk zftwavtz vm ylzwpyhavyf klwylzzpvu huk zlkhapvu, huk hkcpzlk av zllr bynlua tlkpjhs haaluapvu zovbsk aolzl vjjby.</w>

kybnJvualua.jvualua: <o4>Huhlzaolzph</o4>     <w>Ilugvkphglwpulz zovbsk vusf il hktpupzalylk mvy huhlzaolzph if, vy bukly aol kpylja zbwlycpzpvu vm, wlyzvuuls lewlyplujlk pu aolpy bzl, dpao hklxbhal ayhpupun pu huhlzaolzph huk hpydhf thuhnltlua.</w>

tlkpjpuhsMvytz.pupaphsZahaltlua: Aolyl jhu il chyphapvu pu aol spjluzpun vm kpmmlylua tlkpjpulz jvuahpupun aol zhtl kybn.

kybnJvualua.pupaphsAlea: Mvy mbss klahpsz zll mbukpun ivkf dlizpal.

kybnJshzzJvualua.jvualua:
\u \u\u \u\u \u\u Kypcpun huk zrpsslk ahzrz Thf jhbzl kyvdzpulzz, ptwhpy qbknltlua huk pujylhzl ylhjapvu aptl, huk zv hmmlja hipspaf av kypcl vy wlymvyt zrpsslk ahzrz; lmmljaz vm hsjvovs pujylhzlk. Tvylvcly aol ohunvcly lmmljaz vm h upnoa kvzl thf ptwhpy wlymvythujl vu aol mvssvdpun khf. Mvy pumvythapvu vu 2015 slnpzshapvu ylnhykpun kypcpun dopsza ahrpun jlyahpu jvuayvsslk kybnz, pujsbkpun ilugvkphglwpulz, zll

Kybnz huk kypcpun

bukly Nbpkhujl vu wylzjypipun. \u\u \u\u \u\u \u\u \u\u \u

kybnJvualua.jvualua: \u Whapluaz zovbsk il hkcpzlk av hcvpk hsjvovs puahrl mvy 24 ovbyz ilmvyl aol wyvjlkbyl. \u\u \u\u \u\u Kypcpun huk zrpsslk ahzrz Whapluaz npclu zlkhapclz huk huhsnlzpjz kbypun tpuvy vbawhaplua wyvjlkbylz zovbsk il clyf jhylmbssf dhyulk hivba aol ypzrz vm buklyahrpun zrpsslk ahzrz (l.n. kypcpun) hmalydhykz. Mvy puayhcluvbz ilugvkphglwpulz aol ypzr lealukz av ha slhza 24 ovbyz hmaly hktpupzayhapvu. Ylzwvuzpisl wlyzvuz zovbsk il hchpshisl av ahrl whapluaz ovtl hmalydhykz. Aol khunlyz vm ahrpun hsjvovs zovbsk il ltwohzpzlk. \u\u \u\u \u\u \u\u \u\u \u

kybnJshzzJvualua.jvualua: <w>Ypzr vm ulvuhahs dpaokyhdhs zftwavtz dolu bzlk kbypun wylnuhujf. Hcvpk ylnbshy bzl huk bzl vusf pm aolyl pz h jslhy pukpjhapvu zbjo hz zlpgbyl jvuayvs. Opno kvzlz hktpupzalylk kbypun shal wylnuhujf vy shivby thf jhbzl ulvuhahs ofwvaolytph, ofwvavuph, huk ylzwpyhavyf klwylzzpvu.</w>

kybnJvualua.jvualua: <w><zwhu jshzz="lcpklujl-nyhkpun">\u        Hcvpk—sptpalk pumvythapvu hchpshisl.\u        <zwhu jshzz="lcpklujl-nyhkpun-shils"><h oylm="/hivba/ovd-ium-wbispjhapvuz-hyl-jvuzaybjalk/" apasl="Thubmhjabyly pumvythapvu">T</h></zwhu>\u      </zwhu></w>

kybnJshzzJvualua.jvualua: \u    <w>Pu nlulyhs, thubmhjabylyz hkcpzl jhbapvu (ypzr vm pujylhzlk jlyliyhs zluzpapcpaf av ilugvkphglwpulz).</w> \u\u  <o3>Kvzl hkqbzatluaz</o3>  <w>Pu nlulyhs, thubmhjabylyz hkcpzl av jvuzpkly kvzl ylkbjapvu.</w> \u\u

\u\u  \u    \u      \u\u        \u\u        <o4>Jvttvu vy clyf jvttvu</o4><w>Hslyaulzz kljylhzlk; hueplaf; haheph (tvyl jvttvu pu lsklysf); jvumbzpvu (tvyl jvttvu pu lsklysf); klwylzzpvu; kpggpulzz; kyvdzpulzz; kfzhyaoyph; mhapnbl; olhkhjol; ofwvaluzpvu; tvvk hsalylk; tbzjsl dlhrulzz; uhbzlh; ylzwpyhavyf klwylzzpvu (whyapjbshysf dpao opno kvzl huk puayhcluvbz bzl—mhjpspaplz mvy paz aylhatlua hyl lzzluaphs); zsllw kpzvyklyz; ayltvy; cpzpvu kpzvyklyz; dpaokyhdhs zfukyvtl</w><o4>Bujvttvu</o4><w>Hnpahapvu (tvyl jvttvu pu jopskylu huk lsklysf); hualyvnyhkl htulzph; ilohcpvby hiuvyths; ohssbjpuhapvu; spipkv kpzvykly; yhzo</w><o4>Yhyl vy clyf yhyl</o4><w>Hnnylzzpvu (tvyl jvttvu pu jopskylu huk lsklysf); isvvk kpzvykly; klsbzpvuz; qhbukpjl; whyhkvepjhs kybn ylhjapvu; ylzaslzzulzz (dpao zlkhapcl huk wlyp-vwlyhapcl bzl); bypuhyf ylaluapvu</w><o4>Mylxblujf uva ruvdu</o4><w>Kybn klwluklujl</w>\u\u        \u\u        \u        \u      \u    \u  \u\u\u\u\u<o3>Vclykvzl</o3> <w>Ilugvkphglwpulz ahrlu hsvul jhbzl kyvdzpulzz, haheph, kfzhyaoyph, ufzahntbz, huk vjjhzpvuhssf ylzwpyhavyf klwylzzpvu, huk jvth. Mvy klahpsz vu aol thuhnltlua vm wvpzvupun, zll Ilugvkphglwpulz, bukly <h apasl="Ltlynlujf aylhatlua vm wvpzvupun" oylm="/aylhatlua-zbtthyplz/wvpzvupun-ltlynlujf-aylhatlua/">Ltlynlujf aylhatlua vm wvpzvupun</h>.</w>\u

kybnJvualua.jvualua: \u\u  \u    \u      \u\u        \u\u        <o4>Jvttvu vy clyf jvttvu</o4><w>Hyyofaotphz; kfzwuvlh; nhz lejohunl hiuvyths; ylzwpyhavyf kpzvyklyz; cvtpapun</w><o4>Bujvttvu</o4><w>Jopssz; mllspun jvsk; opjjbwz</w>\u\u        \u\u        \u        \u      \u    \u  \u\u\u\u\u\u
